price: Na pamoja nao wake zao wenye kutuliza macho, hirimu zao.
footnotes: Na huko Peponi watakuwa na wake ambao macho yao hayawatazami ila waume zao tu, hawawaangalii wengineo, nao ni wa miaka sawa na waume zao. Kwa hivyo wameelekeana kuwafikiana.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
